text: “Hey kids
Let’s meet the Halloween Family with Bob the train.”

Daddy Monster daddy Monster 
Dressed like Dracula

I’ll scare you I’ll scare you
Playing my viola

Daddy Monster daddy Monster 
Dressed like Dracula

I’ll scare you I’ll scare you
Playing my viola
“Daddy Dracula is so scary!”

Mummy Mommy Mummy Mommy
Wrapped up in white

Do not run Do not run
I don’t bite

Mummy Mommy Mummy Mommy
Wrapped up in white

Do not run Do not run
I don’t bite
“I don’t believe Mummy Mommy!”

Brother zombie brother zombie
Are you hungry?

Yes I am Yes I am
Won’t you feed me?

Brother zombie brother zombie
Are you hungry?

Yes I am Yes I am
Won’t you feed me?
“Umm sorry! I’ve got to be somewhere else”

Sister witch sister witch
Where are you going?

It’s full moon Be back soon
I’ll be flying

Sister witch sister witch

Where are you?

Boo! Boo! Boo!
